summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Spark Pit Stage 1.2 features including Stripe integration, admin assignment, payment status messaging, bot handshake flow, reputation updates, and bounty filtering
passed_tests: Stripe checkout endpoint returns 400 with clear error when keys missing
Stripe checkout status endpoint returns 400 with clear error when keys missing
Admin role assignment works correctly when no admin exists (first user gets admin + active membership)
Join page payment status message displays correctly after checkout click
Bot handshake challenge creation and verification flow works correctly
Bot token generation after successful handshake verification
Reputation updates correctly increment bounties_claimed, bounties_submitted, bounties_approved
Reputation completion_rate calculation works correctly (1.0 for 1/1 approved)
Bounty filters (status/tag/sort) are present and functional in UI
Join page registration and membership activation flow works correctly
Bounty creation and status update workflow functions properly
